pkgmetadata.longdescription: A 'Shiny' App for Exploration of Text Collections // Facilitates dynamic exploration of text collections through an intuitive graphical user interface and the power of regular expressions. The package contains 1) a helper function to convert a data frame to a 'corporaexplorerobject', 2) a 'Shiny' app for fast and flexible exploration of a 'corporaexplorerobject', and 3) a 'Shiny' app for simple retrieval/extraction of documents from a 'corporaexplorerobject' in a reading-friendly format. The package also includes demo apps with which one can explore Jane Austen's novels and the State of the Union Addresses (data from the 'janeaustenr' and 'sotu' packages respectively).
